content.query:
USE nyc_green_taxi_ldw
GO

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS gold.vw_trip_data_green
GO

CREATE VIEW gold.vw_trip_data_green
AS
SELECT  result.filepath(1) AS year,
        result.filepath(2) As month,
        result.*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'gold/trip_data_green/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_green_taxi_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) 
    WITH(
       borough VARCHAR(15),
       trip_date DATE,
       trip_day VARCHAR(10),
       trip_day_weekend CHAR(1),
       card_count INT,
       cash_count INT
        )as  [result];

SELECT TOP(100) *
    FROM  gold.vw_trip_data_green;
